[Information]

Our elegant silver bling cake stand is adorned with sparkly leaded cut crystals wired into place and designed with detailed attention. This glimmering gemmed cake stand consists of three rows of twinkling crystal beading around the edges and attractive silver ball feet for added regal feel. Sumptuously display your cake using this dreamy piece or create an eye catching centerpiece by placing it atop your bridal table with LED candles or a bowl of submersible floating candles reflecting enchanting silhouettes all around!


Additional Information:

  • Uses: Birthdays, Weddings, Table Decoration, Event Decoration, Centerpieces.

entry.title: 15FT Long Crystal Beaded Ceiling Drape Curtains With Hardware Kit
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_3110
Type: Decorations
Price: 69.99

[About]

Quantity: 1 Set of Ceiling Drape
Material: Metal, Acrylic

What you get:

  • 15x Strands of Iridescent Beads (preset on 2x Rods)
  • 4x Rods
  • 8x Ceiling Hook Mounts
  • 8x Sets of Steel Brackets
  • 8x Sets of Screws
    		•
    Overall Size: 15ft L x 20" W
    Each Bead Strand Length: 14.8ft
    Bead Size: 1cm (Diameter) x 1mm (Thickness)
    Bead Color: Iridescent
    Each Rod Size: 20"L x 0.5"W
    All sizes are approximate measurements
    Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]


    Additional Information:

    • 2x of the Rods are already installed along with the beads, the other 2x rods are not attached.
    • Item comes with a Bag of Parts needed to hang item. Bag contains the following:

    8x Sets of Steel Brackets:

    1. Each Steel Bracket is pre-installed with 2x Washers, 2x Nuts, 2x Screws, 2x Stoppers.
    2. Steel Brackets are attached to a beam that will help support the item. Each of this set will use 1x Set of Screws so it can be screwed down on to the beam support

    8x Sets of Screws:

    1. Each Set is individually wrapped with 2x Screws, 2x Plastic Anchors
    2. These Screws go into the small oval holes of the Steel Brackets into the supporting beam to mount the item

    Each Rod contains 2x Triangular Hangers on each end to slide the Ceiling Hook Mount through.

    1. Triangular Hanger Size: 0.5"L x 0.5"W
    2. Ceiling Hook Mount Size: 4" Diameter x 0.75" Thick
    3. Ceiling Hook: 1.25"L x 1"W

    Individual Parts Measurement:

    • SET of Steel Bracket:
      • Contains: 2x Large Ovals, 2x Small Ovals, and Center Hole
        • Steel Bracket: 3.5"L x 0.75"W x 1mm (Thickness)
        • Washer Outer/Inner Diameter: 0.5", 0.5cm
        • Nut: 1cm Length x 4mm Inner Diameter
        • Screw: 0.75"L x 1cm W x 0.5cm Neck Diameter
        • Stopper: 0.25" L x 1cm Diameter
    • SET of Screw:
      • Screw: 1"L x 0.25" W x 4mm Neck Diameter
      • Plastic Anchor: 1"L x 1cm W x 0.5cm
      • Each Set is individually wrapped

    How to Install:

    1. You will need to find/create 2x Parallel Support Beams with enough space between each other to assemble this item
    2. Take 1x Set of Steel Bracket and remove the Stoppers. Take 1x Set of Screws.
    3. Take Steel Bracket and place on preferred area on Support Beam with bottom tip of screws facing you. Take a Screw and insert into opening of Plastic Anchor from Screw Set. Proceed to drill into one of the small ovals on the Steel Bracket into the Support Beam. Repeat this step for the remaining Plastic Anchor and Screw.
    4. Take 1x Ceiling Hook Mount and align its 2 holes so that the Screws from the Steel Bracket can go through it. Proceed to take the 2x Stoppers removed from the Steel Bracket and screw on each Screw Tip to secure the Ceiling Hook Mount.
    5. Repeat Steps 2 + 3 assemble another Hook Mount across the one you just setup (ALLOW ENOUGH SPACE for attaching the rods)
    6. Take one of the Preset Rod w/Beads. Each end of the Rod has a Triangular Hole to slide into the Ceiling Hook Mount. Slide each Triangular Hole on the Rod into each Ceiling Hook Mount.
    7. Repeat the Previous Steps to Hook the other Preset Rod w/Beads. At this time, you can choose how far or close you'd like the other end of the Ceiling Drape to be. This creates a wide or narrow Drape Effect based on preference.
    8. OPTIONAL: You can create more Drape Effects of varying size if you choose to use 1x or 2x of the remaining Rods. If you'd like to proceed with this option:

    8-1. Repeat the previous Steps for installing the Ceiling Hook Mounts for however many rods you choose to use. The only thing different is when you are applying the Drape effect with the remaining rods, you are pushing each rod against the beads as you attach it to the Ceiling Hook Mounts. Once the rod is attached, align the bead strands by following the alignment of the Preset Rod.

    8-2. Once the bead strands are aligned, pull each strand of beads in the direction of your preference to help shape the size of the Drape Effect.

entry.title: 16" Tall - Silver Metal Cake Stand, Cupcake Display Stand with 35 Acrylic Crystal Chains
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_4110
Type: Cake Stands
Price: 39.99 - 179.96 (2 variants)

[About]

Quantity: 1 Cake Stand
Material: Metal with Acrylic crystals
Color: Silver
Overall Height: 16"
Top Diameter: 14"
Top Height: 1"
Base Diameter: 9.5"
Base Height: 4"
Total Acrylic Chains: 35
Each Acrylic Chain Length: 14"
2 Piece Structure: Base + Top
Assembly required: Yes
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

[Information]

Add a big dose of glitz and glam to your cake or dessert table with our bejeweled chandelier crystal cake stand. Use this chandeliered metal and crystal adorned cake stand to sumptuously display your wedding cake or cupcakes. With the unrivaled grandeur and luxuriousness of chandeliers, this stunning accessory will evoke elegance and style. For a dazzling display, place mirrored vases, floating candle bowls, or chandelier candle holders around this server and see how enchantingly your ambiance will glow. Seamless luster of metal tray coupled with the twinkling glimmer of acrylic crystal chains make this cake server a true emblem of imperial sophistication. Coordinate this regal piece with our other crystal embellished accessories and decorations to create an entrancing ambiance.

Cupcake Capacity:

  • Mini Cupcakes:  35pcs
  • Classic Cupcakes:  15pcs
  • Jumbo Cupcakes:  11pcs
  • Please note these are approx. figures as how many can fit depends on the size of the cupcakes and how it's spaced out.

 

Additional Information:

  • Total Acrylic Beads: 630 (18 Beads / Chain)
  • Acrylic Bead Size: 0.5"
  • Cake Stand Parts come unattached to avoid damage in transit
  • Easy to Assemble: Simply attach Base + Top and twist until tightened.
  • Uses: Birthdays, Weddings, Table Decoration, Event Decoration, Centerpieces.
entry.s:tag: cat-sub2_Acrylic Diamond Cake Stand and Toppers

entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_4400
Type: Centerpieces
Price: 59.99

[About]

1 Qty: 1x Chandelier/Order

Contents:

  • (6x) 11" Poles
  • (5x) Big Connectors
  • (5x) End Connectors
  • (3x) Tip Connectors
  • (3x) Small Connectors
  • (3x) Washer Screws
  • (1x) Chandelier
    		•
    Materials: Acrylic Diamond, Metal
    Colors: Silver, Clear

    Overall Height (Assembled):

  • With Spare Poles: 68"
  • Without Spare Poles: 46"
    		•
    Chandelier Top Diameter: 8.5"

    Chandelier Height:

  • With Hook: 51.5"
  • Without Hook: 38"
    		•

    Base Dimensions:

  • Diameter: 7"
  • Thickness: 1"
    		•
    All sizes are approximate measurements.
    Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

    Crystal clear acrylic diamond strands cascade enchantingly in mystic swirl design with seamless sheen and exceptional clarity, making this chandelier look almost liquid! We call it Enchanted Dance Chandelier, and why not! It looks like a crystal fairy twirling magically, exuding bedazzling and bewitching sparkle all around. Made to meet the imperial taste of elites, this glam gem is ideal to rival any 5-star atmosphere. Add a dash of royal glimmer and shimmer to your wedding, reception, birthday, or special events; a couple of these will transform your party ambiance into a divine realm. Bring a touch of luxury into your everyday life by glamming your bedroom or dining room up with this deluxe beauty. Either hang it by the ceiling, arches, or passageways to create a sophisticated effect or place it atop your plush tablecloths and linens to emanate fascinating flicker all around.

    Additional Information:

    • Spacing: Chains holding the beaded diamonds are spaced ½ apart
    • Additional Accessories: Chain and Hanging Hook
    • Uses: Table Decoration, Event Decoration, Centerpieces, Birthday, Wedding, and any other events.

entry.title: 33" Tall Blush | Rose Gold 4 Arm Metal Candelabra Votive Candle Holder
entry.summary:
Vendor: HIER_4300
Type: Centerpieces
Price: 74.99

[About]

Quantity: 1 Candelabra
Material: Glass with Acrylic Crystals
Color: Rose Gold | Blush
Overall Height: 33"
Overall Width: 17"
Bowl Width: 9"
Bowl Depth: 4"
Includes Acrylic Chains and Tear Drops
All sizes are approximate measurements
Due to different light settings the actual color might vary a bit from the pictures.

    [Information]

     

    4 Arm Metal Candle Holder

    Combining lustrous sheen of glistening metal with dazzling acrylic diamond crystals, our exclusive line of chandelier candelabras are a true emblem of regal opulence. Seamless gloss of shiny reflective metal is highlighted by luxurious crystal diamonds dangling enchantingly, exuding surreal radiance all around. 

    Multi-purpose and Versatile

    With a large round cup in the center and four smaller holders stretching from each side, this spectacular candle stand is an elegant substitute to the simple candlesticks. Ethnic design is titivated by adding deluxe diamond crystal chains and imperial metal finish. Use it as a candle or votive holder, table top wedding Decor, wedding flower stand, or simply as a plush wedding centerpiece. Wider middle holder can be filled with flowers, kissing balls, acrylic ice crystals, LEDs or silk rose petals, with tea lights, candles, or votive on the side holders. 

    Crystal Beads and Droplets

    This sparkly bundle of divine shimmer is a lovely alternative to a plain candle holder, adorned with multitudes of crystal beads and droplets that reflect the light playfully and create several dancing silhouettes as you light a votive, a tea light, or a candle in the holders.

    Additional Information:
    • Uses: Table Decoration, Event Decoration, Centerpieces, Birthday, Wedding, and any other events.
    • All sizes are approximate measurements
    • Note: Candles and Decorations NOT INCLUDED

[Information]

Add a big dose of glitz and glam to your cake or dessert table with our bejeweled chandelier crystal cake stand. Use this chandeliered metal and crystal adorned cake stand to sumptuously display your wedding cake or cupcakes. With the unrivaled grandeur and luxuriousness of chandeliers, this stunning accessory will evoke elegance and style. For a dazzling display, place mirrored vases, floating candle bowls, or chandelier candle holders around this server and see how enchantingly your ambiance will glow. Seamless luster of metal tray coupled with the twinkling glimmer of acrylic crystal chains make this cake server a true emblem of imperial sophistication. Coordinate this regal piece with our other crystal embellished accessories and decorations to create an entrancing ambiance.

Cupcake Capacity:

  • Mini Cupcakes:  42pcs
  • Classic Cupcakes:  17pcs
  • Jumbo Cupcakes:  13pcs
  • Please note these are approx. figures as how many can fit depends on the size of the cupcakes and how it's spaced out.

 

Additional Information:

  • Capacity: 25 lbs max
  • 3 Piece Structure: Base + Middle + Top
  • Chain Length: 11"
  • Chain Width: 0.5"
  • Uses: Birthdays, Weddings, Table Decoration, Event Decoration, Centerpieces.

    With such elevated elegance and startling sparkle, this splendid chandelier will give you a truly heavenly experience. Four majestic tiers of countless crystal beads with multifaceted surface cascade enticingly, grabbing the attention and admiration of beholders. With this glam gem dangling mystically all the way down from your ceilings to the tables or stage, the effect will be of pure divine sophistication. This spectacular chandelier features 4 concentric rings dripping with tons of clear, high gloss acrylic crystal strands. These sparkly circle beads are of the top grade acrylic crystals and are highly faceted to catch the light and ooze with divine luminosity. Use this as it is to create a truly luxurious party ambiance at your wedding, party, passageway, entryway, dining room, lobby or bedroom or incorporate with LEDs and lights for that surreal shimmer look and feel that is attributed to paradise. If you want that MADE IN HEAVEN experience, then this long, slender and inspiring chandelier will be up to it. eFavorMart.com is here to make that Heavenly experience possible for you to create in real life.
